subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carmelo Anthony scored 28 points, and Amar’e Stoudemire had 17 points and 10 rebounds as the Knicks improved to 2-1 on the season by beating Charlotte at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Carmelo Anthony scored 28 points, and Amar’e Stoudemire had 17 points and 10 rebounds as the Knicks improved to 2-1 on the season by beating Charlotte at Madison Square Garden.
